Hello. I’m Sam, I’m 16 and based in the UK. This means I operate in GMT/BST timezones. Are you looking for a build or a top grade UI designer? You’ve found your spot. 

I’ve been doing roblox development for around 4 years and UI design for around just as long. I have seperate portfolios for each industry, i’ll link them just below here. 

I’m not going to discuss numbers here as I estimate prices base
